product.title: CROC� Hair Professional Premium Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5"
product.title_excluding_brand: Premium Infrared Black Titanium Flat Iron 1.5"
product.description:
Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types


For Professional & Home Use


Straighten your hair with ease and comfort with the ultimate Premium Infrared Flat Iron! Featuring infrared technology and a curved barrel, this flat iron can penetrate the cortex of your hair to protect its integrity while creating professional results. Plus, its deluxe thumb grip and color-changing cool tip make styling even more comfortable and safe — no kinks! This flat iron is perfect for all hair types, including color-treated and coarse hair.

Made in Korea

product.description_full:
Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types


For Professional & Home Use


Straighten your hair with ease and comfort with the ultimate Premium Infrared Flat Iron! Featuring infrared technology and a curved barrel, this flat iron can penetrate the cortex of your hair to protect its integrity while creating professional results. Plus, its deluxe thumb grip and color-changing cool tip make styling even more comfortable and safe — no kinks! This flat iron is perfect for all hair types, including color-treated and coarse hair.

Made in Korea MORE FEATURES ABOUT MASTERS FLAT IRON


 * The SECRET BLACK (PICO TITANIUM) PLATES on a masters flat iron provide an anti-stick, anti-static, anti-damage smooth one-pass glide on ALL HAIR TYPES.
 * The Best Flat Iron Creates negative ions, which help to seal the cuticles and increase shine.
 * The ventilation system of the masters flat iron for hair dissipates extra high heat, so reducing harm to the inside as well as the outside.
 * Built-in ceramic heaters in the Masters Flat iron for hair straightening allow for quick heat recovery and provide continuous heat while the iron is in operation.
 * Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°]
 * ‌Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V]
 * Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌
 * Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌
 * Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable.
product.description_full_html:
Flat Iron Designed for All Hair Types


For Professional & Home Use


Straighten your hair with ease and comfort with the ultimate Premium Infrared Flat Iron! Featuring infrared technology and a curved barrel, this flat iron can penetrate the cortex of your hair to protect its integrity while creating professional results. Plus, its deluxe thumb grip and color-changing cool tip make styling even more comfortable and safe — no kinks! This flat iron is perfect for all hair types, including color-treated and coarse hair.

Made in Korea

More Features about Masters Flat Iron

  • The SECRET BLACK (PICO TITANIUM) PLATES on a masters flat iron provide an anti-stick, anti-static, anti-damage smooth one-pass glide on ALL HAIR TYPES.
  • The Best Flat Iron Creates negative ions, which help to seal the cuticles and increase shine.
  • The ventilation system of the masters flat iron for hair dissipates extra high heat, so reducing harm to the inside as well as the outside.
  • Built-in ceramic heaters in the Masters Flat iron for hair straightening allow for quick heat recovery and provide continuous heat while the iron is in operation.
  • Fully digital temperature settings [280F° – 450F°]
  • ‌Dual voltage capabilities [110V – 240V]
  • Built-in, automatic shut-off, safety feature after 30 minutes of non-use. ‌
  • Convenient 9-foot swivel cord for easy use and adaptability. ‌
  • Deluxe thumb grip, ergonomic design make styling more comfortable.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
